item.title: Getting started with validation
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting validation set up or installed. Validating a name entered by User # Validating the Name entered by a User contain the following check Ensure it is not empty Ensure it contain only alphabets, space and/or dot. So, the regular expression for this is ^[A-Z][a-z]*(\.?\s?[A-Z][a-z]*)+$ This means ^ -> Should start with [A-Z] -> the first letter should be capital case [a-z]* -> the leading letters should be small case (Optional and not applicable for Initials.
